column5: Hope they don't have these things round here, I have taken a stand on a hydro line a few times  http://www.fieldandstream.com/blogs/field-notes/2013/10/deer-hunter-leaps-tree-escape-helicopter-tree-trimmer?src=SOC&dom=fb
Could you imagine that thing coming at you!  Man..  Scary stuff!
Ground Blinds from now on.  Jumping down 15 ft cant be that bad Cliff.HAHAHA
Wow !!!!! Holy crap..... That would be a nasty outcome !!!
That whole helicopter cutting device looks like a bad idea.

I figure that anybody going around weilding 5- 70 inch blades  hung from a helicopter should first think about the risk to hunters during hunting season. That would have been a lawsuit and a half...  I also figure squirrels have another predator to look out for
Thats an insane tool, but ya they should know its hunting season..I hope the company bought him a new stand and crossbow..
Thats an insane tool, but ya they should know its hunting season..I hope the company bought him a new stand and crossbow.. and pants
If Tim Allen had "rewired" a hedge trimmer that's what it might have looked like.
